de.oth.blockengine

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.oth.blockengine.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the game loop and holds instances of every class Start the window with start()

    • Constructor Summary

      Game()
      Create and initialize a new game with default configuration
